bibl.title: Response.
Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning
bibl.author: BOWMAN, Alan K.

bibl.note: Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. - Observations on the papers presented at the colloquium.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor-in-Chief), Jennifer E. GATES, Andrew T. WILBURN (Guest Editors), Timothy RENNER, John WHITEHORNE (Editors), Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning = BASP 42 (2005) Special Thematic Section, pp. 257-266.
